post.summary: Update page contents for privacy policy, Terms & conditions and About us
post.description:
This API is use to update page contents for privacy policy, Terms & conditions and About us 
 
 title : required 
 
 tag : required | in (PRIVACY_POLICY , TERMS_CONDITIONS , ABOUT_US) 
 
 data : required 
 
 Note: Add encrypted data while testing

data.example:
Monte Sereno Health‚óè

Privacy Policy

Agreement

 

Privacy Policy - MSH

 

Effective Date:  August 31st, 2021

Monte Sereno Holdings Corporation (“MSH ,” “we,” “us,” or “our”) recognizes the importance of protecting the privacy of your personal information, and we have prepared this Privacy Policy to provide you with important information about the privacy practices applicable to the MSH Platform and any website or service that links to or refers to this Privacy Policy (collectively, the “Services”).  In addition, individually identifiable information that you provide to us for purposes of obtaining medical care from Monte Sereno Health Silva Platform (“SILVA”) (such information is also referred to as “Protected Health Information” or “PHI”) will also be subject to any SILVA Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act Notice of Privacy Practices (the “HIPAA Notice”), which may be provided in future.  The HIPAA Notice describes how SILVA and we can use and share your PHI and also describes your rights with respect to your PHI.  To the extent that there is a conflict between this Privacy Policy and the HIPAA Notice with respect to PHI, the HIPAA Notice will prevail.

post.description:
This API is use to update profile for (Patient) 
 
 first_name : required 
 
 middle_name : required 
 
 last_name : required 
 
 country : required 
 
 state : required 
 
 city : required 
 
 age : optional 
 
  address : optional 
 
 is_married : required ( 0 => No , 1 => Yes) 
 
 have_children : required ( 0 => No , 1 => Yes) 
 
  how_many_children : required 
 
 id_national : required 
 
 id_other : required 
 
 nationality : required 
 
 biometric_id : required 
 
 insurance_id : required 
 
 profile_image : optional 
 
 Note: Add encrypted data while testing

get.description: This API is use to get specialities for doctor profile.
This API is use to get user profile

post.description:
This API is use to update profile for (Doctor) 
 
 first_name : required 
 
 middle_name : required 
 
 last_name : required 
 
 country : required 
 
 state : required 
 
 city : required 
 
 age : optional 
 
  address : optional 
 
 corporate_reg_no : required 
 
 disciplinary_issues : required (1 => Yes , 0 => no) 
 
 disciplinary_issues_description : optional 
 
 litigations : required (1 => Yes , 0 => no) 
 
 litigations_description : optional 
 
 financials : optional (uploaded image or PDF name)
 
 website_link : optional 
 
 business_type : required (1 => PRIVATE , 2 => PUBLIC) 
 
 years_in_business : required 
 
 staff_name : optional 
 
 profile_image : optional 
 
 ceo : required 
 
 tax_id : required 
 
 departments : required (1 => Yes , 0 => no) 
 
  branches : required (1 => Yes , 0 => no) 
 
 license_no : required 
 
 license_expiration_date : required (Format : YYYY-MM-DD) 
 
 speciality : optional add speciality ids in array 
 
  department_description : optional 

  branch_description: optional  

 hospital_or_clinic : required 
 
 Note: Add encrypted data while testing

disciplinary_issues_description.example: the act, process, or practice of settling a dispute in a court of law

litigations_description.example: the act, process, or practice of settling a dispute in a court of law

post.description:
This API is use for get diagnoses checklist 
 
 specialties : required (28 for differential diagnosis, 42 for causative drugs) 
 
 dob : required (Format YYYYMMDD) 
 
 sex : required (m for male & f for female) 
 
 pregnant : required (n for ‚ÄúNot Pregnant‚Äù, y for ‚ÄúPregnant‚Äù & blank for ‚ÄúNot Specified‚Äù) 
 
 region : required 
 
 querytext : required (symptoms comma separated ‚Äú,‚Äù. E.g. ‚Äì fever,cold,nausea) 
 
 Note : Please add encrypted data
